name: spotizerr
description: Spotizerr is a self-hosted tool connecting Spotify data with Overseerr-style request workflows, allowing users to request tracks or albums in curated collections.
features: Spotify requests: Allows users to request tracks or albums from Spotify.
Request management: Organizes and prioritizes music requests.
Overseerr-style UI: Provides familiar interface for media requests.
User permissions: Controls who can request and approve music.
Download automation: Triggers downloads when requests are approved.
Library integration: Checks existing library to avoid duplicates.
Request history: Tracks all past requests and their status.
Approval workflow: Requires admin approval before processing requests.
Notification system: Alerts users when requests are fulfilled.
Search functionality: Searches Spotify catalog for music to request.
Collection management: Organizes requested music into collections.
API integration: Connects with music download and management tools.
